name: Official Blood Total Cholesterol Test Kit, 5 in 1 Triglycerides Test Kit Professional Grade Quick Blood Lipid Analysis Meter with 10 Cholesterol Test Strips for Home use
short_description: Comprehensive Cholesterol Testing at Home: Get fast, accurate results for Total Cholesterol, Triglycerides, HDL, LDL, and the TC/HDL ratio—all from a single test with our professional-grade home device.

Easy to Use: Designed for effortless at-home use, this cholesterol monitor needs only a tiny 35–40 µL sample and delivers precise results in just 2 minutes—bringing lab-quality testing into the comfort of your home.
Smart Data Tracking: Our home cholesterol monitor stores up to 300 results with time and date stamps, making it easy to check past tests and track long-term heart health trends.
All-in-one kit: Includes everything needed for testing: 1 x Test device, 10 x Test Strips, 10 x Lancets, 1 x Storage Bag, 1 x Lancing Pen

Real Customer Support – Forget chatbots or endless wait times. Our dedicated support team is here to help you step by step. We also provide clear video tutorials and an easy-to-follow user manual to make setup and use easily.

name: Total Cholesterol Test Meter Cholesterol Meter with 10pcs Strips
short_description: This item includes 1pc Test meter, 10pcs CHOL strips, 1pc Lancing device, 10pcs Lancets and 1pc Storage bag.
The CHOL strip can only test total cholesterol, it can not test HDL, LDL or TG.
The Code Card is placed in the packaging box of the CHOL strips bottle.
product_description: Product Information: Sample volume: 10 uL; Test time: 26 seconds; Testing range: 100 - 400mg/dL ( 2.59 - 10.35mmol/L ); Data memory capacity: 50 groups; Storage temperature: 50ºF - 86ºF Operating temperature: 50ºF - 104ºF Correctness: ±20% When CHOL≥150 mg/dL (3.88 mmol/L) Package Contents: 1pc Test meter 10pcs CHOL strips 1pc Lancing device 10pcs Lancets 1pc Storage bag Please Note: 1. The CHOL strips can only test total cholesterol, it can not test HDL, LDL or Triglycerides. 2. The Code Card is placed in the packaging box of the CHOL strips bottle. 3. The test meter can also test U A and G L U. But this item only includes the CHOL strips. If you need U A or G L U strips, you can buy them separately.

short_description: ✅ Easy to Use - Easiest to operate 5-in-1 lipid test on the market with just only ONE small sample (35~40uL) to get your results.
